title: The Mobile Man (Game - Blade Trinity)
description:
The Mobile Man (Game - Blade Trinity)

please seed, and leave feed back for other users




1.) Change your phone connection settings to memory Card from Connectivity option : Connectivity-USB Settings-Memory Card.
2.) Now your phone memory has become a simple Pen Drive.
3.) Open the memory via P.C.. just like you do to open a pen drive.
4.) Find the folder "K-Java" in that.. & open that folder.
5.) Copy your games in the "K-Java" folder.
6.) Your are done!!!!

Caution: After copying the games,close the memory the same way you close a pen drive.

HAPPY GAMING...
